entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 13 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 14.
